content: Awww! I love ‘there is no bad weather, only improper clothing.’ Reminds me of Ani, who had some sort of digestion thing a few years ago, where her food wasn’t processing/being digested. She ballooned out despite pumpkin and yogurt and spinach. She could barely waddle. We finally gave up on our vet and dragged her to the pet ER, where she insisted on stumbling about the waiting room, giving everyone a happy tail and a kiss, if they’d let her. She couldn’t even sit down at that point, but she never lost her bounce. She was given meds and of course shot dark chunky horror all over every inch of our car two hours later, but I mostly remember how being miserable just wasn’t in her makeup. She never cried. She didn’t whimper. Your line about weather made me remember that some of us wear a certain outfit every day because we don’t know there are other clothes. ❤
